levelList.name: Tidepiercer Lance
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Clash Power +1 for every 2 enemies with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 2)
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every [ColdAirDOQ] on target (max 2)

levelList.name: Tidebreaker Lance
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Base Power +1 for every 2 enemies with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 2)
[WhenUse] If the main target has [ColdAirDOQ], gain +1 Atk Weight
[WhenUse] Final Power +1 for every [ColdAirDOQ] on the main target (max 2)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

coindescs.desc:
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict +2 [Sinking] Count
- If target has [ColdAirDOQ], inflict 1 [Sinking]

levelList.name: Tide-Hunt
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [FreezingDOQ]
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
[WhenUse] When attacking targets with [FreezingDOQ], gain +2 Atk Weight
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 2 enemies with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 2)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -50% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

levelList.name: Slay the Ocean, Slay the Ocean!!
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every enemy with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 30%)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 10(1 + [ColdAirDOQ] on target) bonus Gloom damage

levelList.name: Slay the Ocean, Slay the Ocean!!
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with [FreezingDOQ]
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed
[WhenUse] Deal +5% damage for every enemy with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 30%)
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 2 enemies with [ColdAirDOQ] (max 3)
[DefeatDuel] Deal -80% damage and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target

coindescs.desc: [UnBrokenCoinOnSucceedAttack] Inflict 10(1 + [ColdAirDOQ] on target) bonus Gloom damage

levelList.name: The Indomitable Knight
levelList.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[WhenUse] Gain 2 [Agility] next turn (once per turn)
[WinDuel] Heal 15 SP
[DefeatDuel] Lose 10 SP

levelList.name: Cell Injection
levelList.desc: [OnDirectAttack] Coin Power +2 for this Skill

levelList.name: Ripping Slice
levelList.desc: Final Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)

levelList.name: Swinging Slice
levelList.desc: [WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 1 [Binding] on target (max 2)

levelList.name: Multiple Jabs
levelList.desc: Final Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict Gloom damage equal to [NervousImpairment] on target

levelList.name: United Will
levelList.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[StartBattle] Apply 2 [Agility] next turn to the allied Cultist of the Deep with the slowest Speed

levelList.name: Propagating Bliss
levelList.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[StartBattle] Apply 2 [Enhancement] next turn to the allied Cultist of the Deep with the fastest Speed

levelList.name: Rite of Liberation
levelList.desc:
Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[WhenUse] If target has [Binding], Final Power +2
[WinDuel] Inflict 6 [Sinking]

levelList.name: Environmental Adaptation
levelList.desc:
Final Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)
[StartBattle] Gain 50 Shield
[EndBattle] If this unit has remaining Shield, gain 2 [Enhancement] next turn

levelList.name: For the Landbound Kins
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] If [NetherseaBrandUnit] is activated here, Final Power +3
- Gain additional 1 Final Power for every 1 Stage of [NetherseaBrandUnit]

[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on the main target (max 2)
At Stage 2 or higher [NetherseaBrandUnit], inflict +1 more [NervousImpairment] with this Skill

levelList.name: The Impatient Ego's Byway
levelList.desc:
[CantDuel]
This Skill does not deal damage against targets
[EndSkill] Gain 100 [AbyssalVitality]

levelList.name: Echoes of Respite
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritizes allies; among them, prioritize allies with the least current HP
When targeting allies, deal 0 damage
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 4)
[StartBattle] When targeting allies, heal (20% of target's max HP) HP

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an ally, apply 1 [DefenseUp] this turn and next turn for every 4 [AbyssalVitality] consumed to summon the target (max 5)
[OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an enemy, inflict 3 [Sinking] and 2 [NervousImpairment]

levelList.name: Echoes of Ascending
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Prioritize allies with the most current HP
When targeting an ally, deal 0 damage
Clash Power +1 for every 3 [Sinking] on target (max 4)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an ally, apply 1 [AttackUp] this turn and next turn for every 4 [AbyssalVitality] consumed to summon the target (max 5)
[OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an enemy, inflict 3 [Sinking] and 2 [NervousImpairment]

levelList.name: Cyclical Ecosystem
levelList.desc:
[CanDuelGuard]
[EndBattle] Consume [AbyssalVitality] for every surviving ally; however, apply (# of turns target survived) [AttackDmgUp] next turn to all allies (max 3)
- [DefeatDuel] Does not apply [AttackDmgUp] next turn

levelList.name: With Deep Blue Charity.
levelList.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Base Power +1 for every 3 [NervousImpairment] on the main target (max 9)
When targeting allies, deal 0 damage
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed

[DefeatDuel]
- Gain 3 [ResultReduction] and 3 [Paralysis]
- Deal -80% damage, and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target
- Halve the amount of [NervousImpairment] inflicted by this Skill, and does not inflict [Sinking] or [Sinking] Count
- Halve the amount of [AbyssalVitality] gained from this Skill
[EndSkill] Gain 100 [AbyssalVitality]
[EndBattle] At the start of the next turn, generate [NetherseaBrandUnit] in the ally territory

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an ally, heal 10% of their max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an ally, heal 10% of their max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an ally, heal 10% of their max HP
[OnSucceedAttack] When targeting an enemy, inflict 4 [Sinking], +4 [Sinking] Count, and 4 [NervousImpairment]

levelList.name: Tidal Arc
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] At 50+ [AbyssalVitality], consume 5 [AbyssalVitality] to inflict +2 more [NervousImpairment] with this Skill's effects
[WhenUse] For every 5 [NervousImpairment] on target, consume 1 [AbyssalVitality] to gain Clash Power +1 (max 5)

levelList.name: Fierce Currents
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] At 50+ [AbyssalVitality], consume 4 [AbyssalVitality] to gain Coin Power +1
[WhenUse] For every 10 [NervousImpairment] on target, consume 3 [AbyssalVitality] to gain Coin Power +1 (max 2)

levelList.name: Undulating Waves
levelList.desc:
[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 3 [NervousImpairment] on the main target (max 9)
[EndBattle] Consume up to 10 [AbyssalVitality] and gain half of consumed Stack as [AttackUp] next turn (max 5, rounded up)
- [DefeatDuel] Does not gain [AttackUp] next turn

levelList.name: Before the compassion they believe in loses its worth.
levelList.desc:
Prioritizes targets with the most [NervousImpairment]
Base Power +1 for every 3 [NervousImpairment] on the main target (max 9)
Can Clash with this Skill regardless of Speed

[DefeatDuel]
- Gain 3 [ResultReduction] and 3 [Paralysis]
- Deal -80% damage, and damage dealt by this Skill cannot Stagger the target
- Halve the amount of [NervousImpairment] inflicted by this Skill, and does not inflict [Sinking] or [Sinking] Count
- Halve the amount of [AbyssalVitality] and Shield gained from this Skill
[EndSkill]
- Gain 100 [AbyssalVitality]
- Gain Shield equal to 20% of this unit's max HP
- Ends this turn
[EndBattle] At the start of the next turn, generate [NetherseaBrandUnit] in the ally territory
